scripts.typespec:compile-separate: for file in tsp/apis/*.tsp; do api=$(basename "$file" .tsp); echo "Compiling $api..."; mkdir -p ../output/openapi/$api; tsp compile "$file" --output-dir ../output/openapi/$api; mv ../output/openapi/$api/openapi.yaml ../output/openapi/${api}.yaml; rmdir ../output/openapi/$api 2>/dev/null || true; done
scripts.typespec:compile-all: npm run typespec:compile && npm run typespec:compile-separate
